async chapps.rest.routers.live.refresh_config_on_disk(passcode=Body(Ellipsis))

Writes the current effective config to disk.<br/> Requires the CHAPPS password to be provided as the body.<br/> If line transmission security is an issue, an SSL proxy layer will

be required. This is true for the entire application.
